mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Secretary_Fridge_Used (fridge_used_id, fridge_id, food_id, fridge_quantity_used, fridge_food_name) VALUES (fridge_used_seq.NEXTVAL, #{fridgeId}, #{foodId}, #{fridgeQuantityUsed}, #{fridgeFoodName})
mapper.select: SELECT fridge_food_name, fridge_quantity_used, fridge_used_date FROM Secretary_Fridge_Used ORDER BY fridge_used_date DESC

SELECT f.food_id, f.food_name, f.fridge_id, fr.fridge_name, COALESCE(MAX(u.fridge_used_date), f.food_input_date) as reference_date FROM Secretary_FRIDGE_FOOD f LEFT JOIN Secretary_Fridge_Used u ON f.food_id = u.food_id JOIN Secretary_Fridge fr ON f.fridge_id = fr.fridge_id GROUP BY f.food_id, f.food_name, f.fridge_id, fr.fridge_name, f.food_input_date HAVING (SYSDATE - COALESCE(MAX(u.fridge_used_date), f.food_input_date)) >= #{days}
